text: Thomas Reynold (fl. 1395–1397), of Leominster, Herefordshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Leominster in 1395 and January 1397.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/reynold- thomas ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs 1395 Category:People from Leominster Category:English MPs January 1397
title: Thomas Reynold (MP)
